#Example: Russia & Lappland
severe_winter = {
	3488 3766 3991
	# Scandinavia
	4 5 8 9 10 11 17 18 19 21 22 27 28 29 30 31 32 33 3204 3220 3219 3221 3222 3205 3775
	# The Alps
	73 110 165 166 205 1768 1867 1870 1871 1873 128 132 76 5075
	# The Pyraneese
